meta.job_title: Inside Sales Manager for New Markets (U.S/EMEA/LatAm)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a team of Inside Sales Representatives to meet and exceed company sales objectives in conjunction with sales direction and marketing.
Lead the outbound attack strategy for the U.S region.
Research accounts, identify key players, and ensure a full pipeline for all ISRs.
Coordinate prospect attack campaigns to target white space opportunities.
Set, track, monitor, and enforce key inside sales metrics including meetings set, SQL to FSQL ratio, email sequence, and outbound phone call activity.
Join sales calls with regional sellers to assist in the first meeting pitch and offer support where necessary.
Use lead generation tools to find the right prospects based on a specific attack criteria, and update the CRM system.
Collaborate with BD team, Sales Ops, Marketing, Product Management, and other departments to improve processes that affect sales performance.
Interview, select, hire, train and assign staff. Provide direction and mentoring, develop and communicate performance metrics to assess the effectiveness of staff.

education_certification.credential: 2-3 years of sales experience working against and exceeding an assigned sales quota in an advertising, marketing, or SaaS-related role
1-2 years experience managing a sales team
Experienced with getting results in the U.S region
Self-motivated, able to adapt to an ambiguous, fast-paced sales environment
Professional knowledge of terminology, trends and concepts of e-commerce and digital marketing (Nice to have)
Multi-lingual capabilities (German, Spanish, French etc.) (Nice to have)
Experience in advertising sales, software sales (Nice to have)
